docs.title: Welcome to the Homepage of Our Group
Welcome to the Homepage of Our Group
docs.text: Here you can find my notes and track my plans. These materials will be updated weekly.

docs.title: About Our Group
docs.text:
• Our Name: Our group is called the "Foundation," as we focus on studying subjects that will play a fundamental role in the next 50 years. These subjects include mathematics, physics, biology, and computer science.
  • Our Work: We come together to learn these subjects. The summerization will be posted on group members' personal website
  • Join Us: If you are interested in joining us, please fill out the application form and send it to my email.trace26287@outlook.com

docs.title: Personal Introduction
docs.text: This is my personal website. You can call me Minami. I am an undergraduate at Wuhan University, majoring in mathematics. I am particularly interested in abstract algebra, partial differential equations, and deep learning. I am planning to start a startup related to rockets and energy.

docs.title: Q&A
docs.text:
• Why English: Our lab is open for everyone and English is the most convinient language to communicate.
  • Why Mkdocs: Our notes is written in markdown, so it's easy to publish them in mkdocs.

docs.title: 线性空间与线性子空间
Defination
docs.text:
\(\forall \varepsilon > 0, \exists \delta > 0,\)使得对\(x \in \check{N}_{\delta}(x_0)\),都有\(|f(x) - A | < \varepsilon\)

\(记作\lim_{x \to x_0}f(x) = A\)

docs.title: Heine归结原理
docs.text:
\(\lim_{x \to x_0}f(x) = A\)等价于\(\forall x_n: \lim_{n \to \infty} x_n = x_0, \lim_{n \to \infty} x_n = A\)

注意，它们都要在\(\check{N}_{\delta}(x_0)\)有定义

docs.title: the structure of my note
docs.text:
• defination
  • properties
  • important/interesting theorem/conclusion
  • examples

docs.title: steps of constructing notes
docs.text:
• read books and write down the questions on paper
  • type and sort all after learning
  • resort after finishing reading the whole chapter

docs.title: the relationship between notes and toolbox
docs.text:
• notes: type in markdown file
  • toolbox: write on ipad and export as pdf
\[E = {mc}^2\] \[e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0\]

docs.title: 上一周的反思
docs.text: 事务 面临的问题 解决方案 数学学习 听课效率 超前学习 周末时间 时间紧张 合理利用青创营时间 慕课 任务繁杂 快速解决部分——集中做  其他——每天晚上的日程增加 吃饭 决策困难 就近原则+健康原则（蔬菜原则） 睡觉 时间过晚 把洗澡提到晚上日程之前

docs.title: 日程安排
docs.text: 日程安排 7:15 之前出门 称重 22:45 洗澡 先收衣服 23:00 计划 根据信息源表格 没安排完的放代办

docs.title: 一阶重要
docs.text:
线性代数 数学分析 项目 Products and Quotients of Vector Spaces 隐函数求导 游戏部分写完 10h 8h 3h

每天必须安排一项

docs.text:
• list the expected affair due to its importance
  • figure out the expected time
  • one habit to form(over 4 weeks)

docs.title: group meeting
docs.text:
• every Thursday
  • make weekly plan before
  • reflection
  • others

docs.title: daily routine
docs.text:
It's a part of habits, so we need to built it step by step

  • get up at 7:00
  • have breakfast at 7:15
  • eat at the dinning hall(certain kind of food)
  • take bath at 10:50
  • summerize tommorrow's tasks at 11:10
  • go to bed at 11:30
